name: Builder
desc: A stateless utility widget whose [build] method uses its [builder] callback to create the widget's child.

fields.name: builder
fields.desc: Called to obtain the child widget.

nodes.name: Usage of Builder
desc: Using `XXX.of(context)` to obtain a state object of a certain class within the same class may result in a 'context lag' error, which can be resolved using Builder.
